entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Princeton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:40 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -4.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Princeton Airport 3:00 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -4.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.7 kPa falling
Visibility: 19.3 km
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -6.1°C
Wind: SW 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Flurries or periods of freezing rain. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill near minus 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow or rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers early in the evening. Periods of snow beginning in the evening. Risk of freezing rain late in the evening and overnight. Snow level 1400 metres lowering to valley bottom in the evening. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022
